attributes.action: Put recycling bins into all schools
attributes.background: As a high school student, I find it ridiculous that we have no way of recycling around and about the school grounds. In assemblies we are told that we need to reduce, reuse and recycle, but how can we possibly do that whilst we are at school, when there are no recycling bins to do so?

rejection.details: This would be a decision for your school and not the UK Government or Parliament.
